name: Faraway Lands: Rise of Yokai
storyline: Embark on a mythical journey through the enchanting world of Faraway Lands: Rise of Yokai, an immersive and captivating fantasy base-building and survival game set in feudal Japan. As the intrepid leader of a fledgling settlement, you must construct a stronghold, withstand relentless Yokai assaults under the cover of night, recruit diverse immigrants with unique traits, and unravel the secrets of a world teeming with wonders. Explore uncharted territories, forge new alliances, and shape the destiny of a realm torn between light and darkness.
summary: Faraway Lands: Rise of Yokai is a fantasy survival strategy game set in Feudal Japan.Build your town, gather resources, explore new lands, trade with other cities and defend your town against the risen Yokai threat!
